评论详情: Love my new sport skirt.  Very flattering and comfortable feels like wearing nothing

评论概述: I’ve never been someone who regularly wears skirts… until now!
评论详情: Excellent skirt/skort. It has 2 good sized pockets (both are big enough to hold my phone), plus little shorts underneath that keep it securely in place. I’ll probably never wear a skirt without built-in shorts ever again!  I’ve rarely gotten so many compliments on my outfits. I liked it so much that I had to get it in red as well! I only wish they had more colors and patterns.
This skirt is great. I've had it for about a month. I wear it to work and it looks very nice.  I also wear it hiking and running.  Looks the same as the day I got it.
Easy to dress it up or down

评论概述: Fits amazingly and NO UNDERWEAR LINES!!!!
评论详情: I have tried many of these types of “skorts” even though a skort in the 90s was when it looked like a skirt in the front and actual shorts in the back.  This one is lovely and the pockets and overall fit are really nice. My biggest concern with this type of fabric, “athletic wear” material—is always underwear lines because yes sometimes women wear regular underwear!  It did NOT show lines, and the color and fit was overall so awesome and I felt sexy in it!! I am more of a make an effort to look decent (not pajama pants and slippers) to go out even to run errands, and this skirt is a perfect and ideal skirt.  COVID screwed the lack of concern and effort people put in themselves when out in public and it’s saddening and disturbing. This skirt adds femininity, style and sexiness and I really love it. More colors to purchase!  In reference to sizing, this skirt is fairly accurate, but, again the body is so unique that “true to size” does not always apply. I am a Manager at a clothing store, so I fully speak from experience, so read what others say. Also, the height and weight reviews do help.  If you are unsure, measuring yourself and following the size guide definitely helps me in choosing sizes. For me it fit well (I don’t always fit the true to size statements either), so I hope this can help some of you lovely gals!  Have a great summer !
This skirt works great with so many outfits and it’s easy to dress up and dress down. Great item to take on any vacation!

This skirt is amazing! It's the perfect length. The pockets are functional and useful, but without adding bulk to the skirt. The two little slits in the front really help to make it even more comfortable so movement isn't restricted. By the way, I don't play tennis, but just love this as a cute basic item to throw on and go! Great value to add to your wardrobe!  As for sizing, for me personally I'm about half and half with whether I can go with a M or L for bottoms. I rounded down to a M for this because I'm on a weight loss journey now anyway.. I was right because a M fits! It will only fit better as I continue to shape up! 5'4" 185lbs currently.

I absolutely adored the style and color of this item. The red shade is exactly as shown, vibrant and eye-catching. What's great is that the skirt comes with built-in shorts and pockets. It fits me like a shirt mini skirt, which is perfect. However, due to my big butt, it turned out to be a bit shorter than I expected, about 3 inches past my butt. It's definitely on the shorter side! The material feels thick and has that typical gold skirt texture. Just a heads up, the panty line is visible, so it's best to wear a thong with it. Overall, it's definitely on the sexy side. I ordered a small size and it was true to size. It hugs my stomach in all the right ways. This skirt is perfect if you want to look cute and slightly sexy on the golf course or for a casual outing.
I love the look of this skort! The 2 slits in the front are so cute and practical when walking.  It doesnt ride up like other skorts can.  the length is  perfect!

This skirt is high waisted and ends at the perfect length on my upper thigh. Really flattering to curves and for showing your legs. The material is nice and thick, would be super cute for tennis or golf if not just casual wear!
I recently purchased this cargo skirt. I really like the color and the fit. It's comfortable and looks great.

This is skirt is great quality, great vivid color, nice stretchy comfortable fabric, but the sizing is a bit larger than normal. I got a small, My waits is 27" and hip is 38.5", this is "loose-ish" fitting on me. I don't think it will fall off mid activity, but i was expecting a little more secure or tight fit to it.

Blaozn mini cargo skirt with shorts black large: Shorts are attached underneath. FABRIC: Lightweight, stretchy, slick on outside, silky on inside. Quality made. STYLE: Love the cargo look. Cargo pocket on left fits iphone, zipper pocket on right fits key fob, credit cards, etc. Slits in front. FIT: 5'3" 38 top 28 waist. Large is comfortable on me. Not much compression. Wish skirt were an inch or two longer on me. Went with large for the length, medium may possibly fit as well. Overall, happy with this skirt/short combo. For less than $25, excellent value. Recommend. Hope this was helpful.
Fit is perfect! Wear a medium! True to size and looks awesome! Will buy another color! Love this fit and look! Using for hiking!

This skirt become to my favorite bottom now. I love how stretchy it is, the material is super comfortable and soft. It designed for short inside and skirt outside. There are two pockets can definitely fit most of the phone and keys, I have iPhone 15 pro max and fits perfectly. It is true to size, I ordered my normal size medium and fits great, the stretchy is a plus. You can wear it anytime not only for workout.

This has quickly become my favorite skirt. It's comfortable as heck! It fits great, and the slits make it super sexy. I also appreciate the built in shorts for modesty. These are great for any occasion.
Bright fabric with a solid fit. Very comfortable to wear. It moves with me no matter what position I'm in.
Love this color of green. Washed great and fit according to size.  Very comfortable. This will be great for golf.

Super easy to slip on and off. The design is so cute I love the little slits. It has pockets too so that's nice! I'm loving this red color. It also fits really well and is very comfortable. It's got a good stretch too it as well.

My wife usually wears XS vs S and this XS size fits perfectly and looks terrific.  The 25% elastane fabric is stretchy which adds to the allure.  This skirt has shorts built in so it is perfect for sports or noon resort wear. My wife likes this skirt a lot.

I’m obsessed with this skirt. It feels so good on and it also looks great! I could wear this all day long and be completely comfortable. The material stretches, it has pockets, it’s just a good everyday wear skirt. I’m taking this on vacation to a resort to go hiking in this it’s that comfortable.
This skirt fits very well and feels good on the skin. It's comfortable. The synthetic material holds its shape after washing and resists staining. I recommend it.

This athletic skirt caught my eye because it is a little different than the typical athletic skirt with shorts underneath. I liked the cargo pockets on the side to give a little bit of a different detail. The material itself felt like thick swimsuit or Dri-Fit material. There was a lot of stretch and it didn't feel like it was cutting in or pinching anywhere. I'm not sure that I would wear this to actually work out because I think that doing things like lunges make it right up and look kind of bunchy, but I feel like wearing this as a normal skirt would be super cute.

评论概述: Fits slightly snug but close to true size and fun to wear
评论详情: My wife ordered the "Mini Cargo Skirt Workout Tennis Skirts for Women Athletic Golf Skort with Shorts Slit Cute Girls Clothes Summer" and she really likes it though as a size small this fits a tiny bit snug (the medium would be too loose). This is stretch fabric that breathes and is comfortable very much like typical swim suit as far as the fabric goes. So she does not have high expectations of more than one season's wear out of this garment based on the fabric type, we'll see and update the review to let you know. We baby these kind of garments, washing on cool/gentle and always hang dry. She gives it a thumbs up for resort wear & golf and thanks to the skort styling also for playing pickleball. Enjoy!

I loved the style and color of this, but hesitated to get it because I wasn't sure if it had shorts underneath. "Golf Skort with Shorts" is included in the title, but neither the photos nor product description mentions anything about that. I loved the red enough to risk it and am happy to report that it does, in fact, have built-in shorts.  If your tall, this is going to be a mini on you, but I personally like where it hits. For reference, I'm 5'3", 135 lbs, 27" waist, 39" hips and the medium fit well. I took off one star because the fabric doesn't provide ANY compression and is thin enough you can see a panty line, even wearing VS no-show panties. If these came in a heavier compression fabric, I'd buy every color at twice the price.

I’m so happy with this skort!! The material is very soft and smooth, but substantial. The little pockets are both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The slits help you move while looking cute too. I’m going to wear this just as a skirt. Looks so cute with cropped sweaters

评论概述: Cute, comfortable and perfect for working out or casual wear
评论详情: I'm 5'2", weigh 108lbs with a slight athletic build and I got this in an XS. It fits well, albeit a little loose around the hip area. The fabric is stretchy and comfortable. I wash on delicate, no fabric softener, and tumble dry low with dryer wool balls. I never use dryer sheets. I got this to wear for workouts as well as just casual wear in the summer. I prefer athletic skorts due to the fabric usually being comfortable with the high heat we can get. It's thin, but not see-through, and lightweight. The color is vibrant, it's high waisted without being odd looking like some high waisted clothing, and it has pockets. I can never say no to pockets. It's cute and can be paired with virtually anything.

评论概述: Cute skirt, nice material, fits well
评论详情: Nice athletic cut skirt that matches the color exactly as the photo shows.  The material feels like a standard sports fabric and the quality seems nice.  I like that it's a bit unique compared to most of them.  Sizing was a guess since there isn't' a good chart, but it seemed TTS compared to Alo.

I'm going to love this piece for throwing on and running around. It's not fancy but the style is simple and classic and the color works with plenty of tops and sweaters/sweatshirts. It's definitely possible to dress it up a bit but the style is very casual. I don't play golf but we do go to the beach a lot and look forward to wearing this over a swimsuit or just out and about. Construction is solid, piece seems well made. Not sure you can beat this for the price. I'm 5'3" ~115# and the small fit well due to the stretchy fabric. XS might have worked too.

评论概述: Love the stretchy fabric! Definitely a mini…
评论详情: I ordered this for the petite golfer in the family & it fits her well:  ~~ she’s 5’1”, 105 lbs & wears size S & 2/4. ~~ I ordered this in a Small & it’s the right size - she’s muscular, so the short length hugs her in all the right places! ~~ the fabric is great - very stretchy & comfortable. ~~ the pockets work & are useful for a golf ball or glove while playing. ~~ the wide waistband is flattering & doesn’t cut in. ~~ lots of great color choices - I got it in Black to add a basic, but will order a fun color next!  Reasonably priced @ either $19.99 or $24.99, this is a good addition to a sports wardrobe.  **Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** ⛳️

I ordered the Mini Cargo Skirt Workout Tennis Skirts for Women Athletic Golf Skort with Shorts Slit Cute Girls Clothes Summer in the extra small. I am 5'4 in, weigh 108 lbs, and I have a very long torso. This fits me perfectly and is form fitting in the extra small. I could have got away with getting a small since it is pretty tight, but it's not too tight where I wouldn't feel comfortable wearing it. It does look like a pretty slim fit in the pictures, and it's definitely is. It seems to be well made and has good stitching. It is very stretchy and it's like the same material as a swim skirt. I ordered this for fashion because I liked the color. It's pretty close to the color in the photos with the green that I ordered. I will probably wear a black lace mini skirt over or under it to spice it up. The shorts that are sewn in fit me well, and they are not too tight. This is definitely a very short skirt, and I like the pockets. I'm happy with it, thank you.

I cannot begin to say how much I love this skirt!!! It is made of such high quality and comfortable material, fits perfectly according to the sizing chart, and is so well constructed. It looks so flattering on, and works well for playing tennis, but also is so well made and attractive that it is fabulous as a cute little skirt to wear around town as well.  This gives a bit more coverage and style than shorts, and paired with a crop top it looks stylish and sexy  The red is so vivid and bright, and the pocket is very convenient. I will be ordering several more of these in other colors.  I would highly recommend this skirt to anyone considering it! Order it- you will be very happy with your purchase!

评论概述: Comfortable to wear, but doesn't fit my daughter too well
评论详情: I ordered this skirt for my daughter who practices golf. The skirt does look like in the picture and the color is a beautiful, strong red. It is very thin and lightweight and the pockets are really helpful. Unfortunately, in my daughter's case, the fit is not as nice as it looks on the picture. My daughter is very slim, so she can't fill up the skirt and it looks strange and hangs limply on the sides. We wouldn't have ordered it if we knew it would be loose on her. For reference, we ordered size XS and my daughter is 5 feet and weights 88 lb.
